type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.ComponentSelection
type.description: * Represents a tuple of the component selector of a module and a candidate version to be evaluated in a component selection rule.

method.name: getCandidate
method.description:
Gets the candidate version of the module.

returns:the candidate version of the module

method.name: reject
method.description:
Rejects the candidate for the resolution.
param:reason The reason the candidate was rejected.

property.name: candidate
property.description:
Gets the candidate version of the module.

returns:the candidate version of the module
